Welcome to the fleet! This email contains important information regarding your new vehicle ({{registration}}).

ev-advice.subject: Switching to an EV Tariff for {{registration}}
ev-advice.body:
Hi {{driverName}},

As you are receiving a new electric vehicle, we recommend looking into switching to an EV-friendly electricity tariff for your home charging to save on costs.

Many providers offer cheaper overnight rates.

Best regards,
Fleet Management
